POINTLESSLY.Definition: for no good reason; without purpose

PROVOCATIVE.Definition: made to cause a strong reaction

PHRASING.Definition: the way words were put together in the sentence

LOADED QUESTION.Definition: a question that was asked in a way that pushed people to answer in a certain way

BURNING UP.Definition: jokingly saying it was very hot

CLICKED.Definition: opened by pressing on a link online

EFFICIENCY.Definition: ability to do it without wasting energy

FLOATING.Definition: hanging or moving in the air

WAREHOUSE.Definition: a very large building for storing things

STACKED UP.Definition: put in a pile on top of each other

BLINKING.Definition: flashing on and off with light

BACKBONE.Definition: the most important support for it

COMPUTING.Definition: working it out using a computer

PARAMETERS.Definition: the numbers that control how an AI model works

NEURONS.Definition: tiny units in an AI system that act like brain cells

MENACE.Definition: a danger or something that causes worry

NEGLIGIBLE.Definition: so small it does not matter

UNDER THE SPOTLIGHT.Definition: receiving a lot of public attention

ADD UP.Definition: become more when many small parts are put together

VOLUNTARILY.Definition: by choice; because they want to

A MYRIAD OF.Definition: many different kinds of; a lot of

PRONOUNCED.Definition: clearly shown or easy to notice

SWITCH.Definition: change from one thing to another

AMMUNITION.Definition: things used to support their argument

MINDBOGGLING.Definition: extremely surprising or hard to imagine

INTERFACE.Definition: the place on a computer where you see and use a tool

WRAP THINGS UP.Definition: finish; bring things to an end

PALES IN COMPARISON.Definition: looks much smaller or less important when compared

MIRACULOUS.Definition: wonderful and surprising in a good way
